mapper.select: SELECT CENTER_CD, CENTER_NM, CENTER_ZIPCD, CENTER_ADDR1, CENTER_ADDR2, CENTER_TEL, CENTER_FAX, CENTER_IMG, CENTER_MAP, CENTER_URL, CENTER_INFO, USE_YN, START_FLOOR, END_FLOOR, FLOOR_INFO, CENTER_PILOT_YN, CENTER_SPEED_CD FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M WHERE CENTER_CD = #{centerCd}
SELECT A.CENTER_CD, A.CENTER_NM FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CENTER_NM ASC

SELECT A.CENTER_CD, A.CENTER_NM, A.STAND_MAX, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSEB_SEAT_INFO_D WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD ) AS CENTER_SEAT_MAX_COUNT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSER_RESV_INFO_I WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD AND #{resvDate} BETWEEN RESV_START_DT AND RESV_END_DT AND RESV_ENTRY_DVSN = 'ENTRY_DVSN_2' AND RESV_CANCEL_CD IS NULL ) AS CENTER_SEAT_USE_COUNT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSER_RESV_INFO_I WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD AND #{resvDate} BETWEEN RESV_START_DT AND RESV_END_DT AND RESV_ENTRY_DVSN = 'ENTRY_DVSN_1' AND RESV_CANCEL_CD IS NULL ) AS CENTER_STANDING_USE_COUNT FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
